file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 36-12-02-06 - APU BLEED-AIR CHECK VALVE - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL APU BLEED-AIR CHECK VALVE - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do an inspection on the bleed-air check valve of the APU. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY APU BLEED-AIR CHECK VALVE - GENER- ALL 36-12-02-200-801-A AL VISUAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 36-12-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 36-12-02-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. APU BLEED-AIR CHECK VALVE - GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) The APU bleed-air check valve is installed inside the aft electronic compartment. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 36-12-02-000-801-A/400 APU BLEED-AIR CHECK VALVE - REMOVAL AMM TASK 36-12-02-400-801-A/400 APU BLEED-AIR CHECK VALVE - INSTALLATION Hamilton Sundstrand CMM 36-11-28 - Engine and APU - Check Valves C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage Rear Section I D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Aft electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) Remove the APU bleed-air check valve ( AMM TASK 36-12-02-000-801-A/400). J. General Visual Inspection on the APU Bleed-Air Check Valve (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Do a visual inspection on the valve for general conditions. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 36-12-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Refer to Hamilton Sundstrand CMM 36-11-28 - Engine and APU Check Valves, for more information. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the APU bleed-air check valve ( AMM TASK 36-12-02-400-801-A/400). (2) Close access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 36-12-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
